title: TVS Ntorq 125 Captain America edition launched at Rs 98,117
description: TVS has launched a new Super Soldier Edition of its popular NTorq 125, inspired by Marvel’s Captain America. This variant is part of the Super Squad range, which features special editions themed around Marvel superheroes. It is priced at Rs 98,117 (ex-showroom, Delhi). TVS Ntorq 125 gets a new variant inspired by Captain America Gets refreshed camo graphics and additional cosmetic features TVS Ntorq Super Soldier colour and design details Remains mechanically unchanged The Super Soldier Edition is a refreshed take on the earlier Captain America-themed NTorq, first introduced in 2020. This updated version features bold camo-style graphics and styling elements inspired by the iconic superhero’s design cues, aimed squarely at young buyers. The NTorq Super Squad series also includes models themed around other Marvel characters such as Iron Man, Thor and Spider-Man. Mechanically, the scooter remains unchanged. It continues to be powered by the 124.8cc, air-cooled engine that produces 9.5hp and 10.5Nm, and retains features like the Bluetooth connectivity, fully digital display, and sporty styling that the NTorq is known for. The TVS Ntorq is offered in a wide range of variants. Priced at Rs 98,117, the Ntorq 125 Super Soldier Edition continues to sit between the Race Edition and the Race XP variant. It will be available across TVS dealerships starting this month.  Also see: 2025 Aprilia SR 125 launched at Rs 1.20 lakh
author: Ved Janve
excerpt: The NTorq Super Squad Variant receives a fresh new colour with camo graphics.

html:
The NTorq Super Squad Variant receives a fresh new colour with camo graphics.

TVS has launched a new Super Soldier Edition of its popular NTorq 125, inspired by Marvel’s Captain America. This variant is part of the Super Squad range, which features special editions themed around Marvel superheroes. It is priced at Rs 98,117 (ex-showroom, Delhi).

  1. TVS Ntorq 125 gets a new variant inspired by Captain America
  2. Gets refreshed camo graphics and additional cosmetic features

TVS Ntorq Super Soldier colour and design details

Remains mechanically unchanged

The Super Soldier Edition is a refreshed take on the earlier Captain America-themed NTorq, first introduced in 2020. This updated version features bold camo-style graphics and styling elements inspired by the iconic superhero’s design cues, aimed squarely at young buyers. The NTorq Super Squad series also includes models themed around other Marvel characters such as Iron Man, Thor and Spider-Man.

Mechanically, the scooter remains unchanged. It continues to be powered by the 124.8cc, air-cooled engine that produces 9.5hp and 10.5Nm, and retains features like the Bluetooth connectivity, fully digital display, and sporty styling that the NTorq is known for.

The TVS Ntorq is offered in a wide range of variants. Priced at Rs 98,117, the Ntorq 125 Super Soldier Edition continues to sit between the Race Edition and the Race XP variant. It will be available across TVS dealerships starting this month. 

Also see:

2025 Aprilia SR 125 launched at Rs 1.20 lakh
